translations: 唤起情欲的；性感的；性欲发生的（等于 erotogenic）

sentences.sentence: Your body contains many erogenous zones, areas that lead to a feeling of sexual excitement when they are caressed.
sentences.translation: 人的身体有很多性敏感区，这些敏感区如受爱抚会带来性冲动的感觉。

sentences.sentence: Women sometimes think that men have only one erogenous zone.
sentences.translation: 女人们通常认为男人只有一个性区域。

sentences.sentence: There are many more erogenous zones in the body than the obvious!
sentences.translation: 女性的身体有很多的性地带，并不只是那些显而易见的。
